entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
